alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:20PM CDT until June 15 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madison, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
